welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pasay City, where the vibrant culture, warm hospitality, and stunning sunsets await you. Explore the city's iconic landmarks, delicious cuisine, and lively atmosphere, and make unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.name: Spiral
restaurants.description: Spiral is a buffet located in Pasay.
restaurants.address: G/F Sofitel Philippine Plaza, CCP Complex, Atang dela Rama St, 1300 Pasay City, Pasay City

restaurants.name: China Blue by Jereme Leung
restaurants.description: China Blue by Jereme Leung is a chinese restaurant located in Pasay.
restaurants.address: 3F Conrad Manila, Seaside Blvd, 1470 Pasay, Pasay City

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse is a steakhouse located in Pasay.
restaurants.address: G/F S Maison, Conrad Manila, Seaside Blvd, Mall of Asia Complex (at Coral Wy), 1300 Pasay, Pasay City

restaurants.name: Izakaya Kikufuji
restaurants.description: Izakaya Kikufuji is a japanese restaurant located in Makati City.
restaurants.address: Chino Roces Ave (at S. Javier St), 6000 Makati City, Makati City

restaurants.name: Izakaya Nihonbashitei
restaurants.description: Izakaya Nihonbashitei is a japanese restaurant located in Makati City.
restaurants.address: 806 Antonio S Arnaiz Ave (at Amorsolo St), Makati City, Makati City

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves international and domestic flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for Cebu Pacific and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for local carriers such as AirAsia Philippines and SkyJet.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow during peak hours.
